p: Jules-Roger Kuiate designed the study and finalized the manuscript. CÃ©saire Feudjio was the field investigator, contributed to the study design, and drafted the manuscript. Muhammed Arfat Yameen supervised the field work. Guy Sedar Singor Njateng, Muhammed Ahsan Khan, and Stephen Lacmata Tamekou contributed to the data analysis and to draft the manuscript. James D. Simo Mpetga helped in isolation and structure determination of compounds. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
